verbs.description: [ARG0: Disney World] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARG1: that President Donald Trump had been added to its Hall of Presidents attraction] .
Disney World announced on Monday that President Donald Trump [V: had] been added to its Hall of Presidents attraction .
Disney World announced on Monday that President Donald Trump had [V: been] added to its Hall of Presidents attraction .
Disney World announced on Monday that [ARG1: President Donald Trump] had been [V: added] [ARG2: to its Hall of Presidents attraction] .
